SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t2.id, t2.train_data_id trainDataId, t1.data_collection_name dataCollectionName, t1.project_type projectType, t1.tag_language labelLanguage, t2.import_state importState, t2.data_collection_version dataSetVersion, t2.remark, t2.data_type dataType, t2.create_time createTime, t2.creator FROM train_data t1 LEFT JOIN train_data_version t2 ON t1.id = t2.train_data_id WHERE t2.is_deleted = 0
and t1.data_collection_name like concat('%',#{trainDataDTO.dataCollectionName},'%')
ORDER BY t2.create_time DESC ) v GROUP BY v.dataCollectionName, v.labelLanguage, v.projectType ORDER BY v.createTime DESC
